title: Tekken
description: The original Tekken that introduced players to fast-paced 3D fighting and laid the groundwork for one of the most iconic franchises in gaming history.

title: Tekken 2
description: Tekken 2 expanded on the original with new characters, stages and improved gameplay. A cornerstone title in the 3D fighting genre.

title: Tekken 3
description: The 3rd Installment of the Classic 3D fighting game with fast gameplay and iconic characters.

title: Mortal Kombat 2
description: Blood, gore, and brutal fatalities made this a legendary fighting game.
